translation.contact_hr: Contact your HR department to reset the new password
translation.check_username: Please recheck the username or password, or contact the HR department.
translation.health_app: A personal healthcare app that guides you step by step
translation.start_exercising: Change your mindset, upgrade your nutrition and kickstart your fitness journey
translation.lets_get_started: for your health, while having fun and pushing your boundaries.
translation.personal_information: Please fill in your information for accurate calculation.
translation.please_fill_truth: Please recheck that your data is accurate.
translation.age_between_18_65: This program is for people between 18 - 65 years old.
translation.weight_between_30_250: This program is designed for users within the weight range of 30-250 kilograms.
translation.height_between_100_280: This program is designed for users within the height range of 100-280 centimetres.
translation.please_enter_value_4_1000: Please fill in the range between 4 to 1000 mg/dL.
translation.please_enter_value_3_5_19: Please fill in the range between 3.5 to 19 mg%.
translation.please_enter_value_40_160: Please fill in the range between 40 to 160 bpm.
translation.please_enter_value_40_190: Please fill in the range between 40 to 190 mmHg.
translation.please_enter_value_40_170: Please fill in the range between 40 to 170 mmHg.
translation.diet_exercise_program: Following a personalised diet and exercise program will elevate your health and wellness to new heights.
translation.get_advice: Get advice and recommendation from us!
translation.pre_diabetes_exercise_program: A personalised diet and exercise program will help reduce the risk of prediabetes and improve your overall health.
translation.pre_diabetes_high_blood_pressure_exercis: A personalised diet and exercise program will help reduce the risk of prediabetes and hypertension, and improve your overall health.
translation.diabetes_mellitus_exercise_program: A personalised diet and exercise program will help reduce the risk of diabetes and improve your overall well-being.
translation.diabetes_high_blood_pressure_exercise_pr: A personalised diet and exercise program will help reduce the risk of diabetes and hypertension, and improve your overall well-being.
translation.hypertension_exercise_program: A personalised diet and exercise program will help reduce the risk of hypertension and improve your overall well-being.
translation.mission_will_start: The new mission starts on August 12, 2023.
translation.finished_the_exercise: It seems like you haven't completed the quiz
translation.You_may_take_better_care: You can take better care of yourself after passing the quiz
translation.great_right: Well done! You got them all correct!
translation.evaluation_results: See the results and advice on the button below.
translation.strengthen: Strengthen the abdominal and core muscles, protect against spinal injuries, move safely, and reduce back pain.
translation.the_program: The system will save your scores after completing the video.
translation.workout_programs: Workput programs will be unlocked after Mission 4.
translation.little_harder: Try harder to get more stars!
translation.complete_the_mission: Unlock this week's mission to get more trophies.
translation.conquered_the_mission: You have unlocked the mission. Keep up the good work!
translation.want_delete: Do you really want to delete this?
translation.leave_now: If you discard now, your data will not be recorded.
Your account will be permanently deleted.
translation.recovered: Your account data cannot be recovered.
